title: EventBridge to Lambda with SNS
description: Create a Lambda function that monitors if subnets in your VPC run out of available IP addresses.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use an AWS Lambda function that scans the subnet(s) for AWS VPC subnet(s) that are running low on IP addresses and send alert via SNS topic. Amazon CloudWatch Events rule triggers the Lambda function at a desired interval
